title: Keep the past in your heart while you soar high
content: As I write this, I am the saddest I have been in years. Our history is so full of flesh-shed, bloodshed, death and times when humankind mastered his own kind. From slavery to the various revolutions, history weeps with the episodes of gut wrenching and tearful stories of man wronged by man. How w

title: Totka! Really?
content: Every development seems futile when you come across certain incidents in life. Our domestic help, say Mala, shared her fears with me today. She is a hardworking woman, who helps with the daily chores of 4-5 homes and earns her living. She is a single mother of three children- one married daughter

title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
content:
People come and people go, but there are some who continue to live post their physical existence. These people are human but are no less han God for their contributions to humankind. One such man is the man who knew infinity.
